programme.title: Jean Seberg and the FBI, 1979
programme.short_synopsis: How actress Jean Seberg (1938-79) was tormented by the FBI.
programme.medium_synopsis: The detestable confession that confirms that the actress Jean Seberg's life was destroyed by J Edgar Hoover's 'dirty tricks' branch of the FBI.
programme.long_synopsis: The detestable confession that confirms that the actress Jean Seberg's life was destroyed by J Edgar Hoover's 'dirty tricks' branch of the FBI.
